channel.title: Research on Yuan-Kang Lee
channel.description: Recent content in Research on Yuan-Kang Lee

item.title: FRIEREN: A Lightweight System for Face Resizing Image Detail Quality Evaluation via Robust Estimation of Image Naturalness
item.description: FRIEREN (Face Resizing Image Detail Quality Evaluation via Robust Estimation of Image Naturalness), a novel IQA for detail quality evaluation, effectively and accurately evaluates the face image detail quality scaled by different interpolations with low computational complexity,
